languages.text: "Я снимаю с Гильдии Инфернус клеймо позора и дозволяю им носить оружие, биться и умирать за этот корабль".
"I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
languages.original_text: "Я снимаю с Гильдии Инфернус клеймо позора и дозволяю им носить оружие, биться и умирать за этот корабль".

traits.locale_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
"I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
"I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
"I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
"I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
"I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."

languages.text: « Je décrète la guilde infernus lavée de tout déshonneur et autorise ses membres à porter des armes, à se battre et à mourir pour ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."

traits.locale_text: « Je décrète la guilde infernus lavée de tout déshonneur et autorise ses membres à porter des armes, à se battre et à mourir pour ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: «Por la presente, revoco la marca de vergüenza del gremio de infernus y permito que sus miembros porten armas, luchen y mueran por esta nave».
languages.original_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."

traits.locale_text: «Por la presente, revoco la marca de vergüenza del gremio de infernus y permito que sus miembros porten armas, luchen y mueran por esta nave».

languages.text: “我在此撤销控火行会的耻辱烙印。我允许行会成员携带武器，为了这艘船而英勇战斗，慷慨就义。”
languages.original_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."

traits.locale_text: “我在此撤销控火行会的耻辱烙印。我允许行会成员携带武器，为了这艘船而英勇战斗，慷慨就义。”

languages.text: 「私はここに、インフェルヌス・ギルドから恥の烙印を取り除き、彼らが武器を持ち、戦い、この船のために死ぬことを許可する」
languages.original_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."

traits.locale_text: 「私はここに、インフェルヌス・ギルドから恥の烙印を取り除き、彼らが武器を持ち、戦い、この船のために死ぬことを許可する」

languages.text: "Ich befreie die Infernus-Gilde hiermit vom Mal der Schande und gestatte ihnen, für dieses Schiff Waffen zu tragen, zu kämpfen und zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ich befreie die Infernus-Gilde hiermit vom Mal der Schande und gestatte ihnen, für dieses Schiff Waffen zu tragen, zu kämpfen und zu sterben."

languages.text: "An itibarıyla İtfa Loncası'nın utanç damgasını siliyor ve onlara silah taşıma, savaşma ve bu gemi için ölme izni veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "I hereby remove the brand of shame from the Infernus Guild and permit them to carry weapons, fight, and die for this ship."
